comprehensive_overview: VarScan is a platform-independent variant caller for massively parallel sequencing data, focused on variant discovery in next-generation sequencing data. It detects germline variants, somatic mutations, and copy number alterations (CNVs) based on multi-sample or paired tumor-normal data.
core_features: Detects germline variants, somatic mutations, and CNVs
Supports multi-sample or paired tumor-normal data
Enables the use of both DNA-Seq and RNA-Seq data
Provides statistical and heuristical methods for variant calling
Generates detailed variant calls including genotype, read depth, frequency, and quality
